panels.description: Shows if sensor have been active within the last 120 seconds

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "messages" WHERE ("name" =~ /^$Sensors$/ AND "publisher" =~ /^$Publisher$/) AND time >= now() - 120s
SELECT "value" FROM "messages" WHERE ("name" =~ /^$Sensors$/ AND "publisher" =~ /^$Publisher$/) AND time >= now() - 120s

panels.params_js:
{
 from:ctrl.range.from.format('x'),  // x is unix ms timestamp
 to:ctrl.range.to.format('x'), 
 height:ctrl.height,
 now:Date.now(),
 interval: ctrl.template('$__interval'),
 sample: 'Not escaped: $__interval',
 since:ctrl.lastRequestTime
}
panels.title: Sampling Rate
